pageContext.claim: “Unfortunately, some of the press doesn't cover me accurately. In fact, they go out of their way to cover me inaccurately, so I don't think that's a free press. I think that's a dishonest press. And I want to see a free press.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump frequently labels as "fake news" or "enemy of the people" legitimate news organizations that run critical or skeptical articles about him or his administration. Such organizations try hard to get the facts right and quickly correct mistakes when they occur.
